name: Sandbox Network Filter
description: DNS-based domain filtering for sandboxed environments using dnsmasq. Blocks or allows domains through DNS resolution with true wildcard domain support (*.example.com) and automatic Claude Code WebFetch domain integration.

defaultPolicy.description: Default policy for domains not explicitly listed (allow or block)

allowedDomains.description: Comma-separated list of domains to explicitly allow (supports wildcards like *.example.com)

blockedDomains.description: Comma-separated list of domains to explicitly block (supports wildcards like *.example.com)

immutableConfig.description: Make configuration immutable after setup (prevents runtime changes)

allowClaudeWebFetchDomains.description: Automatically allow domains from Claude Code WebFetch permissions

claudeSettingsPaths.description: Comma-separated list of paths to Claude settings files to read WebFetch rules from (relative paths are resolved from workspace root)

allowCommonDevelopment.description: Allow common development domains (package registries, GitHub, npm, pypi, etc.)
